title: One Bert Show Member's Efforts To Get Her Family To Bond Failed!
description:
Our producer Keity has told us about the pressure she feels trying to get her mom and aunt to bond. She finally thought that she created the perfect plan for them, but it failed. Now she feels as if it's her responsibility to make them spend time with one another. We discuss. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
